title: Strengthening Business Competencies: GPS Model-Based STEM Oral Presentation Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Systematically structure STEM topics according to the three stages (General-Particular-Specific) of the GPS model.
Clearly convey complex scientific concepts through a 5-minute-or-less presentation video produced in a mobile environment.
Improve technical accuracy, logical flow, and nonverbal delivery in oral presentations through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
